Hindrances -- Female Saurian Medieval Novice Adventurer
Attributes (4 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d6 Strength: d4 Vigor: d4
Attribute Notes:
Elderly+: -1 Strength step/-1 Vigor step
Young+: -2 Attribute Points
Clueless+: -2 Smarts (common knowledge)
Doubting Thomas: -2 vs. supernatural horror
Warm Natured: -4 Vigor (resist cold)
Yellow+: -2 Spirit vs. fear
Skills (20 Points):
Boating: (agi) d8 Healing: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d4
Climbing: (str) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d6
Faith: (spi) d4 Investigation: (sma) d4 Streetwise: (sma) d6-9
Gambling: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4-2 Tracking: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
All Thumbs: -2 Repair/Roll of 1 breaks device
Bloodthirsty+: -4 Charisma
Charisma: -9 Persuasion/-9 Streetwise
Claws: +2 Climbing
Elderly+: +5 Skill Points
Habit: -1 Charisma
Mean: -2 Charisma
One Leg+: -2 Climbing/-2 Fighting/-2 Swimming
Saurian Senses: +2 Notice
Ugly: -2 Charisma
Young+: -2 Skill Points
Bad Eyes+: -2 on distant visual trait rolls and ranged attacks
Bad Eyes: -2 on distant visual trait rolls and ranged attacks w/out corrective lenses
Blind+: -6 on visual tasks, -2 on social
Hard Of Hearing+: Deaf; automatically fails Notice (hearing)
Hard Of Hearing: -2 Notice (hearing)
One Arm+: Suffers -4 on two-handed tasks
One Eye+: -1 Charisma unless missing eye is covered
Outsider: -2 Charisma (other races)
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (1 points): Rich Hindrances: All Thumbs; Anemic; Arrogant+; Bad Eyes+; Bad Eyes; Bad Luck+; Big Mouth; Blind+; Bloodthirsty+; Cautious; Clueless+; Code Of Honor+; Curious+; Death Wish; Delusional+; Delusional; Doubting Thomas; Elderly+; Enemy+; Enemy; Greedy+; Greedy; Habit+; Habit; Hard Of Hearing+; Hard Of Hearing; Heroic+; Illiterate; Lame+; Loyal; Mean; Obese; One Arm+; One Eye+; One Leg+; Outsider; Overconfident+; Pacifist+; Pacifist; Phobia+; Phobia; Poverty; Quirk; Small+; Stubborn; Ugly; Vengeful+; Vengeful; Vow+; Vow; Wanted+; Wanted; Yellow+; Young+ Saurian Features: Natural Weapons; Outsider; Saurian Senses; Warm Natured

Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Code Of Honor+: Always insists on acting nobly
Curious+: Insists on investigating every mystery and secret
Death Wish: Will risk death for valued goal
Delusional+: Frequently acts on conspiracy belief
Delusional: Has harmless conspiracy belief
Enemy+: Powerful individual or group wants character eliminated
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Greedy+: Violently insists on getting more than a fair share
Greedy: Demands more than a fair share
Habit+: Has dangerous physical or mental addiction
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Heroic+: Always tries to help others
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Loyal: Always takes risks for friends
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Overconfident+: Has excessive opinion of own capabilities
Phobia+: -4 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Phobia: -2 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Rich: 3x starting funds
Stubborn: Never admits error
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Vow+: Has tight restrictions on behavior and decisions
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Wanted+: Has significant trouble with local law enforcement
Wanted: Has trouble with distant law or minor infractions
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 2 Toughness: 6 (2) Pace/Run: -2/+d4
Armor: Chain Hauberk Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Bite (d4+d4); Claws (d4+d4); Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Flail (d4+d4); Spear (d4+d4 R3"); Tail (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon

Flail Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d4
Lame+: -2 Pace/-1 Run step
Natural Weapons: Has Bite, Claws, and Tail features
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run step/+1 Toughness

Small+: -1 Toughness
Spear Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d4
Tail: Tail is a natural weapon
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +2
Arrogant+: Always takes on the biggest threat
Pacifist+: Will not fight living creatures, uses nonlethal methods only in defense
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
Spear Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
